description: Yelp's Fusion API allows you to get the best local business information and user reviews of over million businesses in 32 countries.

blocks.name: getAccessToken
blocks.description: Allows to get an access token.

args.name: appId
args.info: Required: Your App ID obtained from Yelp.

args.name: appSercet
args.info: Required: Your App Secret obtained from Yelp.

blocks.name: getBusinesses
blocks.description: This endpoint returns up to 1000 businesses based on the provided search criteria. It has some basic information about the business.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Required: Access Token obtained from getAccessToken endpoint.

args.name: term
args.info: Optional: Search term (e.g. "food", "restaurants"). If term isn’t included we search everything. The term keyword also accepts business names such as "Starbucks".

args.name: location
args.info: Optional: Required if either latitude or longitude is not provided. Specifies the combination of "address, neighborhood, city, state or zip, optional country" to be used when searching for businesses.

args.name: latitude
args.info: Optional: Required if location is not provided. Latitude of the location you want to search near by.

args.name: longitude
args.info: Optional: Required if location is not provided. Latitude of the location you want to search near by.

args.name: radius
args.info: Optional: Search radius in meters. If the value is too large, a AREA_TOO_LARGE error may be returned. The max value is 40000 meters (25 miles).

args.name: categories
args.info: Optional: Categories to filter the search results with. See the list of supported categories. The category filter can be a list of comma delimited categories. For example, "bars,french" will filter by Bars and French. The category identifier should be used (for example "discgolf", not "Disc Golf").

args.name: locale
args.info: Optional: Specify the locale to return the business information in.

args.name: limit
args.info: Optional: Number of business results to return. By default, it will return 20. Maximum is 50.

args.name: offset
args.info: Optional: Offset the list of returned business results by this amount.

args.name: sortBy
args.info: Optional: Sort the results by one of the these modes: best_match, rating, review_count or distance. By default it's best_match. The rating sort is not strictly sorted by the rating value, but by an adjusted rating value that takes into account the number of ratings, similar to a bayesian average. This is so a business with 1 rating of 5 stars doesn’t immediately jump to the top.

args.name: price
args.info: Optional: Pricing levels to filter the search result with: 1 = $, 2 = $$, 3 = $$$, 4 = $$$$. The price filter can be a list of comma delimited pricing levels. For example, "1, 2, 3" will filter the results to show the ones that are $, $$, or $$$.

args.name: openNow
args.info: Optional: Default to false. When set to true, only return the businesses open now. Notice that open_at and open_now cannot be used together.

args.name: openAt
args.info: Optional: An integer represending the Unix time in the same timezone of the search location. If specified, it will return business open at the given time. Notice that open_at and open_now cannot be used together.

args.name: attributes
args.info: Optional: Additional filters to search businesses. You can use multiple attribute filters at the same time by providing a comma separated string, like this "attribute1,attribute2". Currently, the valid values are hot_and_new and deals.

blocks.name: getSingleBusiness
blocks.description: This endpoint returns the detail information of a business.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Required: Access Token obtained from getAccessToken endpoint.

args.name: bussinessId
args.info: Required: The business ID.

blocks.name: getBusinessesByPhoneNumber
blocks.description: This endpoint returns a list of businesses based on the provided phone number. It is possible for more than one businesses having the same phone number (for example, chain stores with the same +1 800 phone number).

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Required: Access Token obtained from getAccessToken endpoint.

args.name: phone
args.info: Required: Phone number of the business you want to search for. It must start with + and include the country code, like +14159083801.

blocks.name: getBusinessesByTransaction
blocks.description: This endpoint returns a list of businesses which support certain transactions.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Required: Access Token obtained from getAccessToken endpoint.

args.name: transactionType
args.info: Required: Valid values for transaction_type are: delivery.

args.name: location
args.info: Optional: Required when latitude and longitude aren't provided. Address of the location you want to deliver to.

args.name: latitude
args.info: Optional: Required when location isn't provided. Latitude of the location you want to deliver to.

args.name: longitude
args.info: Optional: Required when location isn't provided. Longitude of the location you want to deliver to.

blocks.name: getBusinessReviews
blocks.description: This endpoint returns the up to three reviews of a business.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Required: Access Token obtained from getAccessToken endpoint.

args.name: bussinessId
args.info: Required: The business ID.

args.name: locale
args.info: Optional: Specify the interface locale; this determines the language of reviews to return.

blocks.name: getAutocomplete
blocks.description: This endpoint returns autocomplete suggestions for search keywords, businesses and categories, based on the input text.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Required: Access Token obtained from getAccessToken endpoint.

args.name: text
args.info: Required: Text to return autocomplete suggestions for.

args.name: latitude
args.info: Required: Required if want to get autocomplete suggestions for businesses. Latitude of the location to look for business autocomplete suggestions.

args.name: longitude
args.info: Required: Required if want to get autocomplete suggestions for businesses. Longitude of the location to look for business autocomplete suggestions.

args.name: locale
args.info: Optional: Specify the locale to return the autocomplete suggestions in.
